songs.title: Capcity
songs.body:
I used to think that
I should be good at everything
Now I know I was wrong
I used to think that
I should do right by everyone
Now I know I was wrong
A couple of things is enough
But now I know that
Every wave is just that - cresting and crashing
If it haunted you then
Now you don't remember it

songs.title: Supermoon
songs.body:
My legs are uncrossed, my hands are unglued
I didn't even see the supermoon
Paradise lost, a limb that's removed
I didn't even see the supermoon
Hate to make you have to hate it
Want and need to instigate it
Hate to make you have to hate it
Hate to make you have

songs.title: Gatorade
songs.body:
My mouth is red from Gatorade
I wish that I could make a trade
The sun is hot
I try not to see my friends with clocks for heads
It makes me think about it more instead
Everybody's reaching out to me
Everybody's reaching out to me
